title: Trump Avoids Reporters and Lies About His Tariffs: A Closer Look | Bo Burnham | Nimesh Patel
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump’s mounting legal and political troubles, his escalating war on the press and his lies to supporters about his economic agenda.

Bo Burnham talks about why being 13 is horrifying and fun (among other things) and reads aloud a letter he wrote to himself when he was in sixth grade. He also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

Plus, hear Late Night warm-up comedian Ryan Reiss interview his fellow comic Nimesh Patel, and then hear Nimesh's set on Late Night.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
